PreparerPersonGrp.PreparerPersonNm: LILLIAN GONZALEZ CPA MST CSEP CSRP

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HAYMARKET PEOPLE'S FUND IS AN ANTI-RACIST AND MULTI-CULTURAL FOUNDATION THAT IS COMMITTED TO STRENGTHENING THE MOVEMENT FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE IN NEW ENGLAND. THROUGH GRANTMAKING, FUNDRAISING, AND CAPACITY BUILDING, WE SUPPORT GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATIONS THAT ADDRESS THE ROOT CAUSES OF INJUSTICE. HAYMARKET ALSO ORGANIZES TO INCREASE SUSTAINABLE COMMUNITY PHILANTHROPY THROUGHOUT OUR REGION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HAYMARKET PEOPLE'S FUND IS AN ANTI-RACIST AND MULTI-CULTURAL FOUNDATION THAT IS COMMITTED TO STRENGTHENING THE MOVEMENT FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE IN NEW ENGLAND. THROUGH GRANTMAKING, FUNDRAISING, AND CAPACITY BUILDING, WE SUPPORT GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATIONS THAT ADDRESS THE ROOT CAUSES OF INJUSTICE. HAYMARKET ALSO ORGANIZES TO INCREASE SUSTAINABLE COMMUNITY PHILANTHROPY THROUGHOUT OUR REGION.
IRS990.Desc: GRANTEE PROGRAM: HAYMARKET'S GRANTS PROVIDE ESSENTIAL RESOURCES TO 62 GRASSROOTS COMMUNITY ORGANIZATION ACROSS THE NEW ENGLAND REGION.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: DONOR PROGRAM: OVER THE COURSE OF EACH YEAR, RESOURCES ARE RAISED TO PROVIDE FUNDING TO GRANTEE ORGANIZATIONS THROUGH APPEALS AND EVENTS. THIS YEAR OUR GOAL WAS EXCEEDED. THIS YEAR, HAYMARKET HELD ITS FIFTH ANNUAL GRANTEE GATHERING WITH CAPACITY BUILDING WORKSHOPS IN COLLABORATION WITH TWO LOCAL FUNDERS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY BUILDING: HAYMARKET LEASES MEETING AND OFFICE SPACE TO NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS AND COMMUNITY GROUPS. TENANTS TYPICALLY SHARE A SIMILAR PROGRAMMATIC PURPOSE BUT MAY OR MAY NOT RECEIVE PROGRAMMATIC FUNDING FROM HAYMARKET.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: NEIGHBORS UNITED FOR BETTER EAST BO
DIRECT ACTION FOR RIGHTS AND EQUAL

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE I, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 2
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ORGANIZATION RECEIVES REPORTS FROM GRANTEES EXPLAINING HOW THE FUNDS WERE UTILIZED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: SCHEDULE M, PAGE 1, PART I, LINE 32B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ONLY NON CASH CONTRIBUTIONS RECEIVED BY THE ORGANIZATION ARE PUBLICLY TRADED STOCK THAT IS RECEIVED AND SOLD BY THE INVESTMENT COMPANY.

HAYMARKET PEOPLE'S FUND IS AN ANTI-RACIST AND MULTI-CULTURAL FOUNDATION THAT IS COMMITTED TO STRENGTHENING THE MOVEMENT FOR SOCIAL JUSTICE IN NEW ENGLAND. THROUGH GRANTMAKING, FUNDRAISING, AND CAPACITY BUILDING, WE SUPPORT GRASSROOTS ORGANIZATIONS THAT ADDRESS THE ROOT CAUSES OF INJUSTICE. HAYMARKET ALSO ORGANIZES TO INCREASE SUSTAINABLE COMMUNITY PHILANTHROPY THROUGHOUT OUR REGION.
VOLUNTEERS PROVIDE SERVICES ON FUNDING PANELS AND MAKE UP THE GRANT DECISION MAKING BODY.
THE FINANCE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE 990 PRIOR TO BEING PRESENTED TO THE FULL BOARD. A NARRATIVE IS PROVIDED TO EXPLAIN THE ASPECTS OF THE DOCUMENT'S CONTENTS.
ANNUAL DISCLOSURE IS REQUIRED AND REVIEWED BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS. WHENEVER THERE IS A POTENTIAL CONFLICT, THE BOARD REVIEWS ITS POLICY FOR PROCEDURES.
THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR IS REVIEWED AND EVALUATED ANNUALLY BY AN AD HOC COMMITTEE OF THE BOARD. SALARY INCREASES ARE APPROVED BY THE BOARD.
STAFF ARE REVIEWED AND EVALUATED ANNUALLY BY THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR. SALARY INCREASES ARE APPROVED BY THE BOARD.
